code:
const API_BASE_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL?"".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL,"/api"):'http://localhost:3002/api';const api={// Auth endpoints
register:userData=>fetch("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/auth/register"),{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(userData)}),login:credentials=>fetch("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/auth/login"),{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(credentials)}),// Portfolio endpoints
getPortfolio:token=>fetch("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/portfolio"),{headers:{'Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(token)}}),// Transaction endpoints
buyStock:(token,data)=>fetch("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/transactions/buy"),{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json','Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(token)},body:JSON.stringify(data)}),sellStock:(token,data)=>fetch("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/transactions/sell"),{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json','Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(token)},body:JSON.stringify(data)}),getTransactions:token=>fetch("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/transactions"),{headers:{'Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(token)}}),// Watchlist endpoints
getWatchlist:token=>fetch("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/watchlist"),{headers:{'Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(token)}}),addToWatchlist:(token,data)=>fetch("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/watchlist/add"),{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json','Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(token)},body:JSON.stringify(data)}),// Goals endpoints
getGoals:token=>fetch("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/goals"),{headers:{'Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(token)}}),addGoal:(token,data)=>fetch("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/goals/add"),{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json','Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(token)},body:JSON.stringify(data)}),// Leaderboard endpoint
getLeaderboard:token=>fetch("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/leaderboard"),{headers:{'Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(token)}}),// Search endpoint
searchStocks:(token,query)=>fetch("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/search?query=").concat(encodeURIComponent(query)),{headers:{'Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(token)}}),// Market data endpoint
getMarketData:token=>fetch("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/market"),{headers:{'Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(token)}}),// User profile endpoint
getUserProfile:token=>fetch("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/user/profile"),{headers:{'Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(token)}}),// Remove from watchlist endpoint
removeFromWatchlist:(token,symbol)=>fetch("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/watchlist/").concat(symbol),{method:'DELETE',headers:{'Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(token)}})};export default api;
